remarks.format: ## Remarks A类似于。A resembles a . 差异在于键映射到单个值，而键映射到值的集合。The difference is that a maps keys to single values, whereas a maps keys to collections of values. 你可以创建的实例通过调用上实现的对象。You can create an instance of a by calling on an object that implements . > [!NOTE] > 没有公共构造函数创建的新实例。There is no public constructor to create a new instance of a . 此外，对象的不可变，，也就是说，你无法添加或删除元素或键从对象已被创建后。Additionally, objects are immutable, that is, you cannot add or remove elements or keys from a object after it has been created. ## Examples 下面的示例创建从对象的集合。The following example creates a from a collection of objects. 然后枚举并输出每个密钥和密钥的关联值的集合中每个值。It then enumerates the and outputs each key and each value in the key's associated collection of values. 它还演示如何使用属性和和方法和。It also demonstrates how to use the properties and and the methods and . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此索引的属性提供对特定集合中的值进行索引的能力通过使用以下语法：`myLookup[key]`在 Visual C# 或`myLookup(key)`在 Visual Basic 中。This indexed property provides the ability to index a specific collection of values in the by using the following syntax: `myLookup[key]` in Visual C# or `myLookup(key)` in Visual Basic. 如果`key`找不到在集合中，返回空序列。If the `key` is not found in the collection, an empty sequence is returned. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用直接进行索引。The following example demonstrates how to use to index directly into a . 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
